results.idea: Short-term momentum of SHIELD score
results.description: Use short-term returns of imb5_score to capture momentum. SUGGESTION1: used single strong datafield (imb5_score) because it has high userCount/alphaCount; SUGGESTION2: not applied (no vector field); SUGGESTION3: not applied (coverage 0.8669 > 0.6); SUGGESTION4: applied (imb5_score has high user/alpha counts). KEEP_IN_MINDs followed: implementation short, <=7 operators, <=2 datafields, no group alone. Confidence=0.70

results.idea: Medium-term mean reversion of SHIELD score
results.description: Mean-reversion: current score minus its medium-term average. SUGGESTION1: used imb5_score only for clarity; SUGGESTION2: N/A; SUGGESTION3: N/A; SUGGESTION4: used high-count field. KEEP_IN_MINDs observed. Confidence=0.65

results.idea: Score momentum scaled by market cap (risk-adjusted momentum)
results.description: Multiply short-term score momentum by inverse market cap to overweight small-cap momentum. SUGGESTION1: used both datafields; SUGGESTION2: N/A; SUGGESTION3: N/A; SUGGESTION4: both fields have high user/alpha counts. KEEP_IN_MINDs observed. Confidence=0.68

results.idea: Score volatility breakout

results.idea: Cross-sectional ranking of score acceleration

results.description: If instrument frequently at arg_max in short windows, treat as strong convictive mover. SUGGESTION1: single field; SUGGESTION4 applied. KEEP_IN_MINDs observed. Confidence=0.62

results.description: Require positive ts_ir and moderate volatility before trading momentum. SUGGESTION1: single field; SUGGESTION4 applied. KEEP_IN_MINDs observed. Confidence=0.66

results.idea: Score mean-reversion only for names with low recent NaNs
results.description: Avoid stale data by only acting on names with few NaNs in recent window. SUGGESTION1: single field; SUGGESTION4 applied. KEEP_IN_MINDs observed. Confidence=0.59

results.idea: Score momentum adjusted by sqrt(mktcap) to moderate size tilt
results.description: Weight by inverse sqrt(mktcap) for mild small-cap tilt. SUGGESTION1: both fields used; SUGGESTION4 applied. KEEP_IN_MINDs observed. Confidence=0.67

results.idea: Score momentum with quantile-based thresholding
results.description: Only trade top/bottom quantiles to reduce noise. SUGGESTION1: single field; SUGGESTION4 applied. KEEP_IN_MINDs observed. Confidence=0.65

results.idea: Score acceleration filtered by long-term trend sign
results.description: Act on acceleration only if long-term trend is in same direction to avoid fighting large trends. SUGGESTION1: single field; SUGGESTION4 applied. KEEP_IN_MINDs observed. Confidence=0.66

results.idea: Score momentum shrunk by long-term mean (shrinkage)
results.description: Shrink recent momentum toward long-term mean to reduce overfitting. SUGGESTION1: single field; SUGGESTION4 applied. KEEP_IN_MINDs observed. Confidence=0.63

results.idea: Score breakout when current > recent max and vol rising
results.description: Long when score exceeds 30-day max and short-term vol rising, indicating breakout. SUGGESTION1: single field; SUGGESTION4 applied. KEEP_IN_MINDs observed. Confidence=0.62
